rhumDrinks.name: Tortuga
rhumDrinks.ingredients: El Dorado 8yr Rum (2 oz), cinnamon powder (dash), orange juice (dash), lemon juice (dash), simple syrup (0.5 oz)
rhumDrinks.recipe: Shake ingredients with ice. Strain over fresh ice into a rocks glass. Garnish with candied ginger on a skewer.

rhumDrinks.name: Wiki Wiki
rhumDrinks.ingredients: Blanc Rhum Agricole (1.5 oz), mango brandy (0.5 oz), fresh lime juice (1 oz), fresh pineapple juice (1 oz), petite cane syrup (0.5 oz), 1/2 peeled kiwi
rhumDrinks.recipe: Muddle kiwi in tall glass, add liquid ingredients. Insert swizzle stick, add crushed ice, swizzle. Garnish with pineapple crescent, pineapple fronds, lime wheel, kiwi slice, and orchid.

rhumDrinks.name: The Lamborn
rhumDrinks.ingredients: Mount Gay Silver rum (2 oz), pea juice (2 oz), fresh lime juice (1 oz), jasmine syrup (0.5 oz)
rhumDrinks.recipe: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass over fresh ice. Garnish with pea shoots and flower.

rhumDrinks.name: Caribbean Coco
rhumDrinks.ingredients: El Dorado 3 Year rum (1 oz), Clément Coco rhum (1 oz), coconut milk-based yogurt (0.33 oz), symple syrup (0.5 oz), lime juice (0.5 oz), Angostura Bitters (1 dash)', recipe: 'Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a coconut over ice. Garnish with a generous sprig of mint.

rhumDrinks.name: Salvation Burger Rhum Cocktail
rhumDrinks.ingredients: Diplomatico Anejo Rhum (1.5 oz), Ancho Reyes (0.5 oz), demerara syrup (0.125 oz), Scrappy Cardamom Bitters (2 dashes), Angostura Bitters (2 dash)
rhumDrinks.recipe: Add all ingredients to a mixing glass with ice. Stir until perfectly chilled, and strain over fresh ice into a rocks glass with a large ice cube. Garnish with an orange twist.

rhumDrinks.name: Walking Far From Home
rhumDrinks.ingredients: Plantation White Rum (2 oz), red currant puree (1.5 oz), fresh lime juice (0.25 oz), maple syrup (1:1) (0.25 oz), 1 pinch of Raw Earl Grey Tea, 1 dehydrated lime wheel (for garnish)
rhumDrinks.recipe: In cocktail shaker, combine all ingredients with ice and shake hard for 25 seconds. Double strain over fresh ice into a double rocks glass and garnish with the dehydrated lime wheel.

rhumDrinks.name: Tropic bowl
rhumDrinks.ingredients: Banks 5 Rum (1.5 oz), spiced pineapple syrup (0.75 oz), honey syrup (0.5 oz), fresh lime juice (0.5 oz), 1 muddled strawberry, 1 mint sprig, 1 pinch Salt
rhumDrinks.recipe: Muddle, shake, fine strain on crushed ice in a tiki mug. Optional: garnish with two pineapple leaves, orchid and tiki straw.

rhumDrinks.name: Pirates take Manhattan
rhumDrinks.ingredients: Red Harbor Rum (2 oz), Housemade Spring Vermouth (0.5 oz), Allspice Dram (0.25 oz), House made Papaya-Jerk Spiced Bitters (2 dashes)
rhumDrinks.recipe: Combine all ingredients into mixing glass with ice, stir vigorously, strain into coupe glass, and garnish with skewered brandied cherries.

rhumDrinks.name: Piña Colada
rhumDrinks.ingredients: pineapple-infused rum (1.75 oz), pineapple juice (1 oz), lime juice (0.75 oz), Coco Lopez (1.25 dashes), St. Germain (0.25 oz)
rhumDrinks.recipe: Shake, strain into rocks glass with crushed ice. Garnish with pineapple leaf and vanilla bean, finish with freshly grated nutmeg.

rhumDrinks.name: Daiquiri Pineapple
rhumDrinks.ingredients: Flor de Caña 7 Rhum (2 parts), pineapple juice (2 parts), fresh lime juice (1/3 parts), extra-fine sugar (2/3 parts)
rhumDrinks.recipe: Combine the pineapple juice, rum, lime juice, sugar, and ½ cup ice in a cocktail shaker and shake to chill. Strain into a stemmed cocktail glass. Garnish with pineapple wedge.

rhumDrinks.name: Caribbean Queen
rhumDrinks.ingredients: Mount Gay Black Barrel Rhum (1.5 oz), freshly pressed pineapple/coconut water 1:1 (1.5 oz), lemongrass juice (0.75 oz), fresh lime juice (0.75 oz), Garnish with a pineapple coaster
rhumDrinks.recipe: Build all ingredients in shaking tin. Add ice, shake till cold. Double strain over fresh ice. Garnish and love.

rhumDrinks.name: Mai Tai
rhumDrinks.ingredients: Ron Zacapa Rhum (2 oz), fresh lime juice (1 oz), Cointreau (0.5 oz),  walnut syrup (0.25 oz), 2 lime cubes
rhumDrinks.recipe: Add all ingredients into a mixing glass and shake well. Serve over crushed ice in a Collins glass. Garnish with half a lime shell/wheel and mint.
